## Github

```{r}
library(usethis)
use_git_config(
  user.name = "liemdominic",
  user.email = "lje006@uib.no"
)

usethis::create_github_token()


gitcreds::gitcreds_set()

git_vaccinate()

usethis::use_git()

use_github()

```

```{r}
library(palmerpenguins)
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)

data <- palmerpenguins::penguins 

plot <- ggplot(data = data, aes(x = species, y = body_mass_g)) +
  geom_point()
plot
```
